source_objects.title: Entrepreneurship
source_objects.description: Achieve your entrepreneurship dreams with courses on: lean start-up, developing a business plan, and launching your venture.

items.headline: The ultimate beginner's guide to building a successful freelance writing business from start to finish!

Understand the business of freelance writing
Find a freelance writing niche that is both profitable and interesting

items.title: Introduction To Audacity Audio Software

visible_instructors.title: Dene Collett
visible_instructors.job_title: Aircraft builder, online entrepreneur and skills Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Dene

items.headline: Learn how to make and edit crystal clear audio recordings without the need for expensive and sophisticated equipment.
objectives_summary: Make your very own audio recordings, import audio tracks from external sources, remove ambient noise from your audios. Normalize your audios so that they have an even, full volume. Use the equalizer to make your voice recordings sound much cleaner, crisper and clearer. Use custom fade techniques to blend audio tracks. Learn the fundamental difference between analogue and digital recordings. Learn how to cut sections out of the audio track and insert them elsewhere in your audio. Learn how to generate sound effects and use them in your audio tracks. Learn how to save and export your edited audio tracks as well as get some awesome tips on how to make your life easier with things like keyboard short cuts etc

items.title: Target Marketing & Digital Marketing Find Your Tribe & Niche

visible_instructors.title: Transformation Services
visible_instructors.job_title: International Academy of Life Coaching & Entrepreneurship
visible_instructors.name: Transformation

items.headline: Marketing Blueprint: Laser target marketing strategies, identify & attract ideal clients, & find a profitable niche!
objectives_summary: Know exactly who your ideal clients are and how to reach them
Get to work with the people you truly enjoy
Gain exclusive insight into what your target market truly want so you can better meet their needs

items.title: The Business Building Email Formula to Launch Your Startup
items.headline: Start Building your Business by selling and prospecting with this email sales formula for Entrepreneurs.
objectives_summary: Have people picking up the phone to call you & Separate yourself from the competition. Do something different and dramatically increase your sales leads, good fit prospects and finally get in front of real decision makers…NOW!

Uncover new business sales prospect – FAST Start closing more sales now… Finally Crack the Email Prospecting Code! Let’s face it, email marketing simply does not work for most people in sales. Almost every method being taught is simply another rehashed version of the same old stuff. – And None of it Works! Learn to use this powerful 3x5 email marketing sales strategy and start seeing results.

Learn the email hack that actually produce results. If you’re sick and tired of making cold calls, wasting your money on digital marketing campaigns that don’t live up to the hype, this is a real chance to develop a sales specific strategy to start generating more leads with the actual buyers who are interested in what you sell.

items.title: LEAN FINANCE FOR STARTUPS - EVERYTHING AN ENTREPRENEUR NEEDS

Understand the Income and Expenses associated with running a Mobile App Company

items.title: SLAPbootcamp- create an Action Plan to grow your small biz

visible_instructors.title: Deborah Novick
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur and Tireless Cheerleader for Small Business
visible_instructors.name: Deborah

items.headline: Achieve the growth you want for your business, using the 5-step SLAP methodology.  Thousands of small biz successses.
objectives_summary: You will be able to know when to say Yes to business development opportunities - and when to say no.
You will have an extremely clear sales/marketing/lead gen plan in place.
You will fully understand your business model- including where your profit sits, which products are best to sell more of, what your pricing should be and what expenses you need to cut.
